activity.title: ohcnetwork/care_fe#8133
activity.text:
Hi, I was trying to figure out how `search functionality` by `user_name` in user section is working. 
From what i could understand the `user_name` key-value is set in params and from there, **filter** should be carried out. But I couldn't locate where that filter operation is being performed. 
can you help me out pls, any hint?
